# geluTanhApproximation()

**Instance Method**

Adds a Gaussian Error Linear Unit (GELU) tanh approximation activation operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func geluTanhApproximation() -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<T>
```
